# Clinical Events & Specialties

The Clinical Events & Specialties module identifies specialties
associated with a user-provided clinical event (ex: an asthma diagnosis)
and evaluates the distribution of specialties associated with said event
at the encounter level. This functionality allows users to evaluate the
care patterns associated with a given cohort and determine if they are
expected.

## Installation

You can install the development version of this package like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github('ssdqa/clinicalevents.specialties')
```

# Package index

## Module Execution

- [`cnc_sp_process()`](https://ssdqa.github.io/clinicalevents.specialties/reference/cnc_sp_process.md)
  : Clinical Events and Specialties
- [`cnc_sp_output()`](https://ssdqa.github.io/clinicalevents.specialties/reference/cnc_sp_output.md)
  : Clinical Events and Specialties – Output Generation

## Sample Input

- [`cnc_sp_codeset_file`](https://ssdqa.github.io/clinicalevents.specialties/reference/cnc_sp_codeset_file.md)
  : Clinical Events & Specialties Codeset File Sample
- [`cnc_sp_visit_file_omop`](https://ssdqa.github.io/clinicalevents.specialties/reference/cnc_sp_visit_file_omop.md)
  : Clinical Events & Specialties Visit File Sample – OMOP version
- [`cnc_sp_visit_file_pcornet`](https://ssdqa.github.io/clinicalevents.specialties/reference/cnc_sp_visit_file_pcornet.md)
  : Clinical Events & Specialties Visit File Sample – PCORnet version
- [`cnc_sp_specialty_names`](https://ssdqa.github.io/clinicalevents.specialties/reference/cnc_sp_specialty_names.md)
  : Clinical Events & Specialties - Specialty Naming Sample
